org.apache.hama.pipes.protocol

Interface DownwardProtocol<K1,V1,K2,V2>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BinaryProtocol, StreamingProtocol

    public interface DownwardProtocol<K1,V1,K2,V2>
    The abstract description of the downward (from Java to C++) Pipes protocol. All of these calls are asynchronous and return before the message has been processed. Adapted from Hadoop Pipes.

    • Method Summary
